message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth a bit more than $95.
Hello Alice, I understand your perspective on the value of the product. I am willing to pay $110 for it.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more than $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in valuing the product highly. I am willing to pay $120 for it.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, so I'm thinking of selling it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the additional value you're offering, but I am still committed to finding the best deal possible. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, Bob. I think the extras I'm offering are worth a bit more than that. I'm willing to make a deal at $140, but I'm not sure how much longer I'm willing to negotiate.
Hello Alice, I've done my best to find a fair price for the product. I am willing to pay $135 for it.
